# Arzani Marketplace Monetization and Trust Enhancement Plan

## Overview

To strengthen Arzani's marketplace model and revenue streams, the following updates are proposed in two main areas:

1. Fixing weak execution on trust and secure payments.
2. Introducing monetization on the buyer side.
